org.princehouse.mica.lib

Class SpanningTreeOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.BaseProtocol
      • org.princehouse.mica.base.FailureDetector
        • org.princehouse.mica.lib.SpanningTreeOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Protocol, Overlay, RootedTree, TreeOverlay

    public class SpanningTreeOverlay
extends FailureDetector
implements RootedTree
    Construct a rooted Spanning Tree overlay by using a leader election protocol to decide the root.
    See Also:
